channel.title: Dont want monsters attacking you?
channel.description:
Well then heres a secret that will be usefull to you
Entitys are things like monsters and certin moveable objects (minecarts)
in order to make sure monsters spawn there has to be 1/200 slots not taken if 200/200 slots are taken no monsters in the game will spawn at all. so if you dont want monsters start making 200 minecarts and putting them somewhere. this will despawn every monster once you place all 200 on.
just something i learned in my server. also singleplayer... its pretty neat...
have fun.

item.title: Dont want monsters attacking you?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:8, topic:408653”]I don’t have 1000 iron ingots to spare so I don’t get attacked in one chunk.[/quote] servers are dif then online total Online monster spots are 2000

:3 but area means more then 1 chunk. 1 area is 6 chunks :3

Read full topic

item.title: Dont want monsters attacking you?
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

xx matty xx:

I was thinking this a few days ago, but agl told me the limit is 200 per area :mad:

around 200 and i said i dunno how exactly it works in multi i was talking for single

Read full topic

item.title: Dont want monsters attacking you?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:4, topic:408653”]Make sure your computer and server can process that many entities in the chunk. I’m not sure how minecarts work in 1.7 but even if they’re bumping each other they’re going to cause lag if your computer can’t handle it.[/quote] :3 thats why you also make a room with unpowerd rails. so they dont move.

Read full topic

item.title: Dont want monsters attacking you?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I was thinking this a few days ago, but agl told me the limit is 200 per area :mad:

item.title: Dont want monsters attacking you?
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Make sure your computer and server can process that many entities in the chunk. I’m not sure how minecarts work in 1.7 but even if they’re bumping each other they’re going to cause lag if your computer can’t handle it.

Read full topic

[quote=“badger41, post:2, topic:408653”]So just make a hidden room somewhere and fill it with 200 minecarts on some track and youll be good?[/quote] basicly
